title: Study for "Apotheosis to Thomas Cole"
medium: Brush and oil paint on paper laminate.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of two figures, at lower right, observe an illuminated cross or star in the darkness, at left, as a stream cascades down from rocky pinnacles, in the middleground at center, past two palm trees to merge with a lake at right.

Verso: Sketches for a frame [?], some writing.
name: Drawing
